Free Ireland Golf Map Contact Us About Us Home About Us Established in March 2014, Fairways and FunDays has revolutionised the Golf Vacation experience by providing the Ultimate Golf and Ireland experience for all our clients.  Since this time, Fairways and FunDays has demonstrated that it is the leading Irish Golf Tour Operator and was named Europe’s Best Golf Tour Operator at the prestigious World Golf Awards in 2020 and 2021.  Fairways and FunDays has also been voted Ireland’s Best Golf Tour Operator at the World Golf Awards for the past seven consecutive years at the World Golf Awards.  These awards are presented to the company who have demonstrated the highest qualities in all aspects of their business and was decided by previous clients and by Golf and Tourism industry figures.  Since its incorporation, Fairways and FunDays has grown from a family business to a market leader within the Ireland Golf Vacation sector. Fairways and FunDays exclusively sell Irish Golf Holidays and Ireland Vacations.  Therefore, we are specialists in Ireland and Irish Golf Tours, and have expertise in relation to how clients can make the very most of their time in our beautiful country and enjoy the very best that Ireland has to offer. The experienced and passionate team at Fairways and FunDays provide all our clients with an Ultimate Golf and Ireland experience.  Our tours ensure that clients receive a taste of all that is great and unique about Ireland both “on and off the fairways.” The team at Fairways and FunDays have taken a ground-breaking approach to Golf Tourism and have ensured that our clients whether Golfers or Non-Golfers enjoy the most authentic Irish experience available.  We are the first Golf Tour Operator to offer attractive and customised itineraries to Non-Golfers and Families who are travelling as part of a group.  Our Non-Golfer options have proved so successful that Fairways and FunDays have also welcomed a large number of groups of non-golfing clients to Ireland on incredible sightseeing and leisure tours. Apart from offering the Highest Quality Ireland Golf Vacation experience, Fairways and FunDays also offer the Best Value Irish Golf Holiday’s.  Our firm offers a 110% Price Promise – if you can find the same tour cheaper elsewhere, we will match this price and give you a 10% refund. While all of the management team at Fairways and FunDays are experienced golfers, the management team also have over 30 years’ experience working within the Irish Tourism and Hospitality Industry.  This is the perfect mix of passion, expertise and experience. Our team have developed close working relationships with the best golf courses in Ireland, best hotels in Ireland, best tourist attractions in Ireland, best restaurants in Ireland and the best evening entertainment locations throughout the Island of Ireland.  We promise all our clients an unforgettable visit to Ireland regardless of your budget or the duration of your stay. Fairways and FunDays is a member of the International Association of Golf Tour Operators (IAGTO).  Fairways and FunDays also work closely with Tourism Ireland and Failte Ireland (Ireland’s governing Tourism bodies). The team at Fairways and FunDays are passionate about Ireland, and are passionate about the world class golf facilities and visitor experience which Ireland has to offer.  We want to share this passion with you and ensure that you experience first-hand all that is great about Ireland. Magical Memories are Guaranteed on all our incredible Irish Golf Tours and Ireland Vacations. Quick Links Customise Your Tour Tour Packages About Us Free Ireland Travel Guide Download Free Ireland Map Golf Industry Professionals Terms & Conditions Cookie Policy Privacy Statement Contact Us Contact Us Ireland Office Fairways and FunDays Limited, Unit W10G, Ladytown Business Park, Naas, Co. Kildare, W91 X603 Ireland Tel: +353 4587 1110 Email: info@fairwaysandfundays.com US Office 11807 Westheimer Road, Suite 550, PMB 885, Houston 77077, Texas Tel: 1800 7799 810 Email: info@fairwaysandfundays.com Awards Winner of Ireland’s Best Golf Tour Operator at the prestigious World Golf Awards for the past 8 years, and four-time winner of Europe’s Best Golf Tour Operator, Fairways and FunDays offer the best Ireland Golf Packages available at the very best prices. Ireland is the only destination that we sell, therefore Fairways and FunDays is the true industry specialist in offering the most authentic and best Ireland Golf Trips available. Magical memories are guaranteed on all our Ireland Golf Vacations! © Fairways and FunDays 2025. All

Whether you're a seasoned golfer or a casual fan, immerse yourself in an unforgettable golfing experience surrounded by natural beauty Close Modal View Full Video Events/Activities View Menu Events and Activities Waterpark Pools Cabanas Spa Golf Grande Lakes Sports Ritz Kids Itineraries Shopping Home Events/Activities Golf Golf Where Legends Play The Ritz-Carlton Golf Club, a gem in the region's golfing scene, offers a unique blend of sport and nature. Set on a beautiful ecological site, our golf course is a certified Audubon Sanctuary, featuring a vibrant mix of ponds, wetlands, live oaks and local fauna. As the privileged host of the PNC Championship, the 18-hole championship course tests the abilities of every skill level. It includes a clubhouse, a restaurant, and golf lessons for all ages for a complete golfing experience. Reserve Tee Time - Golf Where Legends Play Reserve Tee Time for Golf Where Legends Play Previous Next More Info 18-hole golf course designed by two-time British Open champion Greg Norman All-grass driving range, putting green, and practice facility Upscale, full-service clubhouse with pro shop and Fairways Pub restaurant and bar Five sets of tees available for varying shot options, with closely mowed turf and short roughs Certified as Audubon Cooperative Sanctuary and endorsed by United States Golf Association Recognized by Golf Course Management magazine as the National Resort Course winner in the "Environmental Leaders in Golf" category Members Club available for Florida residents and frequent visitors Home of the PNC Championship Experience an unforgettable stay at Grande Lakes, where you can witness 20 Major Champions team up with a family member to compete for the coveted PNC Championship. Our special PNC Championship Package is perfect for families, offering tickets for two adults and two children, plus a $50 resort credit. Location: The Ritz-Carlton Golf Club Date: December 18 – 21, 2025. Time: 8:00am - 6:00pm Go to previous slide Go to next slide FAMILY GOLF Before 3 p.m., Juniors 15 and under receive 50% off the rack rate with a paying adult. After 3 p.m., Juniors 15 and under play complimentary with a paying adult. Juniors 15 and under receive complimentary club rentals when playing with a paying adult; balls are not included. Reserve for FAMILY GOLF Golf Instruction Elevate your golf game, regardless of your skill level, with group or private lessons from PGA Golf Pro Larry Rinker. He'll guide you through simple modifications to your golf swing that will allow you to play at your best. Take advantage of Larry's PGA Tour experience and start enhancing your golf game today. Learn More for Golf Instruction Caddie Concierge Program The Ritz-Carlton's tradition of excellent service extends to the golf course through our innovative Caddie Concierge program. Each group is paired with a professional attendant who offers expert guidance on course navigation, hole description and target lines, golf ball location, yardage stats, and golf club cleaning. They'll also provide you with course strategy tips and attend to flagsticks. For reservations or more information about our Caddie Concierge, please call (407) 393-4987 or email grandelakes@caddiemaster.org Membership Become a member and enjoy access to The Ritz-Carlton family pool, Grande Lakes Sports, and 14 dining outlets. You'll also save on room rates, spa services, retail, and food/beverage purchases. Learn more for Membership Going Green The Ritz-Carlton Golf Club has been designated as a Certified Audubon Cooperative Sanctuary. Endorsed by the U.S. Golf Association, this certification ensures the protection and enhancement of wildlife habitats. Plus, the golf club is GEO Certified, signifying adherence to strict standards in nature, water, energy, supply chain, pollution control, and community engagement, with a commitment to continuous improvement. Tennis & Pickleball The Ritz-Carlton Golf & Tennis Club features two tennis courts and two pickleball courts. Improve your game through drills, clinics, and personal instruction from our USPTA certified tennis professional, Marcelo Gouts. For court reservations and lessons call (407) 393-4900. PRO SHOP Elevate your golf game with premium equipment from our Pro Shop. We offer cutting-edge drivers, woods, wedges, and putters, crafted to enhance your performance. Paired with our top-tier golf apparel, you'll stay cool, comfortable, and stylish on the course. Phone: 407-393-4900 Hours Monday - Sunday: 7:00 am - 4:00 pm Fairways After an exhilarating round of golf, unwind with a satisfying meal complemented by a scenic view of the 18th hole. Our clubhouse offers an extensive selection of crafted microbrews and draught beers, carefully selected to enhance your dining experience. Close Modal View Full Video Events/Activities View Menu Events and Activities Waterpark Pools Cabanas Spa Golf Grande Lakes Sports Ritz Kids Itineraries Shopping Home Events/Activities Spa Nature-Inspired Spa Retreat in Orlando The Ritz-Carlton Spa Welcome to our nature-inspired Spa retreat in Orlando, a sanctuary spanning 40,000 sq. ft. Disconnect from the world as you immerse in the tranquil elements of nature and emerge refreshed, relaxed and revitalized. This wellness retreat boasts 40 treatment rooms and a full salon offering a wide array of services. Between or post-treatment, relax in our serene adult-only lap pool or refuel with nutritious fare at Vitale, Spa Café. Signature therapies, including massages and body treatments, incorporate herbs from the resort's organic garden, honey from its resident bees, and citrus from local orchards for a unique wellness experience. The system scans your body generating 1.2 million 3D points of data to create a topographic image for the perfect massage. With synchronized dual arms, enjoy the benefits of a full 60-minute massage in just 30 minutes. Try the world's most advanced massage and elevate your wellness routine. Book Today - Aescape Book Today for Aescape Frequently Asked Questions Florida Resident Savings Florida Resident Savings Florida residents enjoy a 15% savings on treatments Monday through Thursday year-round. Excludes holidays. Packages/offers cannot be combined and are subject to availability. Florida ID required. Prior to Arrival Prior to Arrival What time shall I arrive? To enhance your Spa experience, please arrive 30 minutes before your scheduled treatment. Do I shave before my treatment? Shaving is not recommended prior to service. If you choose to shave, please do so at least six to eight hours before your appointment. For hair removal services, body hair must be at least ¼ inch long for effective removal. Avoid prolonged sun exposure for 24 hours before or after waxing. Avoid any physical activity that will cause excessive heat or perspiration following the service. Brazilian bikini waxing is not available. What should I not bring to the Spa? Lockers are available for clothing; however, it is recommended that you leave valuable items in the safe in your guest room or at home. Cell phones and pagers must be turned off while you are in the Spa. Spa Services Spa Services Do you have to be a certain age to enjoy spa treatments? Spa Facility and Spa Pool use is for guests 18 years of age or older. Guests under 18 years of age are not eligible for body treatments and massages. Guests 16-17 years of age may have facials, with a parent or legal guardian present. Guests 5-15 years or under are eligible for manicures, pedicures, haircuts, and hairstyling only. May I use the fitness center amenities without getting a spa treatment? Fitness Center use is for guests 18 years of age or older. Guests 16-17 years of age have access with a parent or legal guardian, or an authorized consent form. Guests 15 years and under, including infants, are not permitted. Are gift certificates available from the Spa? You may purchase gift certificates for a specific dollar amount. Spa gift certificates can be used toward services or purchases at Tranquility, Spa boutique. Contact the Spa for additional information. Upon Arrival Upon Arrival What do I wear? Most body treatments are enjoyed without clothing, however, please wear whatever is comfortable for you. Disposable underwear is available upon request. During all treatments, the body is fully draped, except for the area being worked on. Robes and slippers are provided in the men's and women's lounges before and after treatments. What about my comfort? Your Spa experience is your time, and you should delight in it to the fullest. If you experience discomfort due to room temperature, massage pressure, music volume, or any other conditions, please tell your therapist immediately. Health Questions Health Questions What if I have special health concerns? When making reservations, please notify the agent if you have high blood pressure, allergies, any physical ailments or disabilities, or if you are pregnant (there are a few services that should be avoided during pregnancy, specifically in the first trimester, but many that can be enjoyed). Spa Policies Spa Policies What if I am late for my treatment? Arriving late will simply limit the time of your treatment, thus lessening its effectiveness and your pleasure. Your treatment will end on time so the next guest will not be delayed. The full value of your treatment will be charged. What if I need to cancel my scheduled appointment? If you must reschedule or cancel your appointment, please notify the spa at least 24 hours in advance to avoid being charged the full service fee. Cancellations of packages or private parties require one week's notice. Groups are subject to a four-week cancellation policy. Please see the Group Coordinator for additional information. Are gratuities included? For your convenience, a 22% service charge will be added to each spa service received. The service charge is dispersed to the spa staff members who served you during your visit. Additional gratuities are at your discretion. How do I pay? A credit card number is required at the time reservations are made. All major credit cards and travelers checks are accepted. You may also charge spa services to your hotel bill or member account. Fitness Center As a registered guest, you have free access to our fitness center, complete with free weights, weight machines, and cardio equipment with TVs. We also provide a variety of workout programs from around the world, including HIIT, Yoga, and Pilates. You can join group fitness classes or opt for private lessons. For personal training sessions and fee details, call us in advance at (407) 393-4200. The fitness center is open 24-hours for your convenience. Vitale, Spa Café After a workout session or a rejuvenating treatment at our facility, you can head over to Vitale. Here you can revitalize your body with health-focused cuisine. We feature a variety of wholesome salads, nutrient-packed power drinks, and tasty smoothies. Is there a resort fee? Yes, a resort fee of $55 plus tax will be added to your daily room rate and allows for the inclusion of luxury amenities and services, including: Enhanced high-speed guest room Internet Mountain bike rental at Grande Lakes Sports (two bikes, one hour/day/room) The Headwaters Waterslides at the JW Marriott AquaVenture 360 interactive waterpark (two guests per room) Shuttle transportation to Sea World, Walt Disney World, and Universal Orlando (24-hour advance reservations required, call x4005) Tennis court access for two guests (one hour per day, per room - tennis racquets & balls are included with court access) Pickleball court access for two guests (one hour per day, per room - pickleball paddles & balls are included with court access) Is there a parking fee? Is there a parking fee? Yes, The Ritz-Carlton and JW Marriott charge a parking fee. The Ritz-Carlton exclusively offers valet parking, while JW Marriott offers both self-parking and valet parking. Valet: $58 plus tax Self-parking: $40 plus tax Are pets allowed at Grande Lakes Orlando? Are pets allowed at Grande Lakes Orlando? Two cats or dogs per room are welcome at The Ritz-Carlton Orlando and JW Marriott Orlando, Grande Lakes. There is a $250 USD (+ tax) non-refundable cleaning fee per stay. Service animals are allowed at both resorts. Is Grande Lakes Orlando family friendly? Is Grande Lakes Orlando family friendly? Yes, Grande Lakes Orlando is family-friendly, offering a range of activities and amenities for families. Our resorts feature family-friendly pools, outdoor activities, and a kids' club, as well as dining options suitable for all ages. How far is Grande Lakes Orlando from Theme Parks? How far is Grande Lakes Orlando from Theme Parks? Universal Epic Universe: 3 miles Sea World: 3 miles Universal Studios: 8 miles Walt Disney World: 9 miles Does Grande Lakes Orlando offer a shuttle service to and from the local theme parks? Does Grande Lakes Orlando offer a shuttle service to and from the local theme parks? Yes, We offer a complimentary shuttle service to Universal Orlando/EPIC, Sea World, Magic Kingdom and Epcot. We are committed to practices that minimize its environmental impact, including water conservation, energy efficiency, waste reduction, and supporting Orlando's local wildlife habitats. Each venue offers an elegant setting, perfect for creating cherished memories and an unforgettable experience for you and your guests. wedding faq What is the role of the Grande Lakes Wedding Team? Our Weddings Team consists of Wedding Sales Executives and Wedding Service Managers. In your initial planning stage, our Wedding Sales Executives will: Check availability for preferred dates Tour wedding locations to assist in selecting the most appropriate venue to meet your needs Design an estimated proposal of costs inclusive of food, beverage, and ceremony rental fees Establish preferred room rates and your guest room block Create a Wedding Agreement to secure your date and location(s) Once your Wedding Agreement has been returned, our Wedding Services Manager will: Design your event Recommend Wedding Vendors in such areas as wedding planning, floral design, photography, videography, officiant, entertainment, invitations, and wedding attire Act as a liaison between your wedding vendors and the hotel Design your floor plan inclusive of such items as tables, dance floor, bars, and wedding cake table Partner with our Culinary Team to customize your personal wedding menu Monitor your guest room block Create an estimate of charges outlining your financial commitment and deposit schedule Detail your Banquet Event Order and Wedding Resume outlining your event specifics To communicate all aspects of your wedding to the hotel Oversee Ceremony and Reception set-up, food preparation, and other hotel operations Review the accuracy of the banquet check, prior to the completion of your final bill What additional wedding items does Grande Lakes Orlando provide? In addition to banquet tables, chairs, and china, the hotel offers a complimentary selection of specialty linen, charger plates, menu cards, dance floor, staging, and cocktail table centerpieces. We can also assist in renting upgraded items such as specialty chairs, upgraded linens, and specialty china. What wedding activities are available for my guests? Get ready for your big day by relaxing in our Spa. We can assist you in planning everything from a day of rejuvenation before the wedding, hair and makeup services, or a party in our luxurious pedicure suite. While some members of the wedding party may relax at the Spa, you can invite others to participate in a golf tournament, fishing, or even eco-tours! Your guests can enjoy an entire weekend filled with activities ensuring memories last a lifetime. Do you have a florist on-site? Our Grande Lakes Floral Team is located on-site and may provide you with the utmost care in personal customization of floral décor for your entire wedding event, even if your ceremony takes place off the property. Costs vary. I'd like to welcome my guests staying at the hotel with something special. Can the hotel assist me with this? Our team will work with you in designing personal welcome gifts, favors, and wedding party gifts. We strive to create meaningful gifts that envelop your personality. Cost may vary per amenity. Planning Guide What is helpful to know when contacting the hotel? The most helpful information for your Wedding Sales Consultant is knowing an approximate number of guests, what time of day you may be interested in, as well as a range of preferred dates. What happens if we book an outside venue and the weather does not cooperate? All events that are booked outdoors will automatically be reserved with a backup location. Your indoor venue will be guaranteed 30 days prior to your wedding and typically takes place in one of our beautiful ballrooms. May I take wedding photographs on the hotel property? Wedding photography is only allowed exclusively for couples getting married at The Ritz-Carlton Orlando, Grande Lakes. Wedding Timeline What is the typical timeline for planning my wedding at The Ritz-Carlton Orlando, Grande Lakes? Initial Planning Stage (approximately, but not limited, to 6 - 12 months prior) Detail Planning Stage (from contract signing to 1 month prior) Contact our Wedding Sales Consultant to check availability and tour locations Reserve your wedding date by having your Wedding Sales Consultant create a Wedding Agreement detailing your date, time, location, room block, and deposit schedule Return your Wedding Agreement within one week with a 25% non-refundable deposit Detail Planning Stage (from contract signing to 1 month prior) Complete your Wedding Planning Guide provided by your Wedding Services Manager Research and book wedding vendors Design your wedding menu and room layout with your Wedding Services Manager Provide a 50% non-refundable deposit 60 days prior to your wedding date Book Spa, Golf, and other guest activities Final Planning Stage (approximately one month prior to wedding day) Provide a final deposit based on estimated charges 21 days prior Sign and return Banquet Event Orders detailing all food and beverage for your wedding at least 2 weeks prior Provide a final guest count to your Wedding Services Manager 72 business hours in advance Culinary May we bring in an outside caterer? All events at The Ritz-Carlton Orlando, Grande Lakes are catered by our exceptional culinary team. Specialty cuisines such as Indian are available and we encourage you to speak with our Wedding Sales Consultant about additional culinary options. What will my reception cost? Typical dinner reception pricing for butler passed hors d'oeuvre, a plated or buffet dinner, open bar, champagne toast, and wedding cake may range from $230 - $300 per person exclusive of tax and service charges. Pricing is guaranteed six months in advance and may vary depending on the actual menu selection. Celebrate Your Special Occasion Turn your special moments into cherished memories at Grande Lakes Orlando. Our venue options accommodate indoor and outdoor events from intimate to grand. From spacious ballrooms to a charming rustic farm, Grande Lakes Orlando is the perfect location for birthdays, holidays, anniversaries, graduations, family reunions, and coming-of-age celebrations. Connect with our team of experts to plan a memorable occasion, from venue to menu, and everything in between. Explore The Beauty of our Outdoor Venues Citrus Garden The dramatic backdrop of the Citrus Garden is the perfect place to host receptions for up to 150 and seated banquets for up to 100. Set the stage with 2,700 square feet of event space and create your perfect event. Da Vinci Lawn & Terrace With 25,200 square feet of flourishing lawns, tropical garden and intimate balconies, we offer paradise in Central Florida. Host receptions for up to 2,100 or seated banquets for up to 1,000, and experience the natural beauty of Grande Lakes. Primo Garden At the Primo Garden, you're invited to soak up the beauty of nature. This charming garden, nestled on the lower level of the Primo restaurant, can host events for up to 50 people, whether it's a sit-down dinner or a vibrant reception. Valencia Lawn Overlooking Grande Lake and its dramatic sunsets, this 24,600-square-foot lawn can host receptions for up to 2,260 and seated banquets for up to 1,120. Oasis Lawn Located adjacent to the JW Waterpark alongside the Oasis Cabanas, the 11,319 square-foot Oasis Lawn accommodates up to 200 rounds or up to 400 for receptions. Fairways Lawn Set between the 18th hole of the Golf Clubhouse, this space hosts receptions for up to 2,100 and seated banquets for to 1,500. Imagine the possibilities with 20,000 square feet of tropical paradise. Palm Courtyard Located adjacent to The Ritz-Carlton pool, the 2,000 square-foot Pool Courtyard accommodates up to 140 rounds of up to 200 for receptions. Whisper Creek Farm An authentic farm-to-fork experience fit for seated groups of up to 250 and receptions of up to 600. Our 6,000-square-foot fruit and vegetable garden with adjoining 11,000 square-foot outdoor event space allows guests to pick and eat the produce, and connect with the space in a more intimate way. Go to previous slide Go to next slide Event Services Audio-Visual Technology Elevate your event with our comprehensive audiovisual rental services, offering everything from projectors to sound systems. Our professional onsite Event Technology specialists ensure seamless setup and support, allowing you to focus on your event. Dedicated Event Managers For weddings, Marriott Certified Wedding Planners can assist you in defining a vision for your special day and ensuring every detail is perfect. For other meetings and events, our planners can handle everything from banquet hall décor to group outings. Conference Concierge Planning a conference? Experience unparalleled attention to detail with our Conference Concierge, appointed to work with your group to help manage every aspect of your meeting and ensure that all of your special requests are met. Impact Experiences Immerse yourself in a meaningful and rewarding stay with The Ritz-Carlton's Impact Experiences. These unique opportunities allow you to contribute to the local community, making a genuine and lasting impact. Each program offers compelling social and environmental activities that go beyond the ordinary. catering Customize your menu and wow attendees with catering provided by our experienced culinary team, including set-ups for buffet-style receptions, plated dinners, or pre-function gatherings. Event Planning Let our team help you plan every aspect of your event so you can focus on what matters. Our event management team can you assist with your selection of flowers, linens, music, and décor. A five foot round table seats eight people comfortably. A six foot round table seats 10 people comfortably. Conference and Hollow Square Appropriate for interactive discussions and note-taking sessions for fewer than 25 people. Many hotels have elegant "boardrooms" for 10 to 20 people, equipped with full audiovisual capabilities, a writing board, cork board and a flip chart. E-Shape, U-Shape and T-Shape Appropriate for groups of fewer than 40 people. These are best for interaction with a leader seated at the head of the setup. Audiovisual is usually best set up at the open end of the seating. Theater Appropriate for large sessions and short lectures that do not require extensive note-taking. This is a convenient setup to use before breaking into discussion or role-playing groups because chairs can be moved. Reception Stand-up social function where beverages and light foods are served. Foods may be presented on small buffet tables or passed by servers. May precede a meal function. Schoolroom or Classroom The most desirable setup for medium to large-size lectures. Requires a relatively large room. Tables provide attendees with space for spreading out materials and taking notes. Ovals and Rounds Generally used for meals and sessions involving small group discussions. A five foot round table seats eight people comfortably. A six foot round table seats 10 people comfortably. Outdoor Activities in Orlando FL| Grande Lakes Orlando Skip to main content Menu Accommodations Offers Dining Meetings & Weddings Marriott Grande Lakes, 4040 Central Florida Parkway, Orlando Florida Experiences Gallery Our Resort Book Your Stay Call reservation booking widget Close Close Marriott Grande Lakes, 4040 Central Florida Parkway, Orlando Florida Call Book your stay. booking widget - booking widget Select Hotel Please Select The Ritz-Carlton JW Marriott The Residences ARRIVAL Departure Rooms 1 2 3 4 5 6 Guest 1 2 3 4 5 6 book youR STAY Video Features Pause Play Sound On Sound Off Video Description Embrace adventure and outdoor fun at Grande Lakes Orlando. This video showcases on-site sports and activities, including cycling through lush green landscapes, kayaking serene waterways, boat rides, and birdwatching. Discover the perfect balance of excitement and nature, creating unforgettable moments in a breathtaking setting. Close Modal View Full Video Events/Activities View Menu Events and Activities Waterpark Pools Cabanas Spa Golf Grande Lakes Sports Ritz Kids Itineraries Shopping Home Events/Activities Grand Lakes Sports Grande Lakes Sports Embark on a journey surrounded by 500 acres of secluded luxury, ideal for families, couples, and group retreats. At Grande Lakes Sports, we offer an exclusive collection of outdoor activities that will fuel your adventurous spirit. Watch the headwaters of the Everglades come alive on a sunrise safari, test your fishing skills on one of our eleven lakes, tackle our hidden mountain bike trail, or delve into the intriguing world of falconry. Eco-Tours Prepare for an extraordinary two-hour Eco-Tour through Shingle Creek. Paddle along the serene waterways in a kayak or canoe, taking in the breathtaking natural scenery. Accompanied by a professional guide, you'll traverse the property in an Outfitter's all-terrain golf cart, journeying to the headwaters of the Everglades. Here, you'll have a rare opportunity to see the rich wildlife that makes Florida famous. Reserve for Eco-Tours Go to previous slide Go to next slide Images for Sunrise Safari Join one of our Certified Florida Master Naturalists on a guided trip on the wild side as you explore the beginning of a new day on the 500-acre Grande Lakes Orlando resort. From the comfort of a customized, all-terrain golf cart, you will have a chance to observe and photograph whitetail deer, bobcats, North American river otters, foxes, raccoons, alligators, and a host of birds ranging from great horned owls to roseate spoonbills. Monday - Sunday 7:00 am - 9:00 am Reserve for Sunrise Safari Images for Archery Master the artistry and precision of archery in a lush tropical setting at our resort. This exclusive experience strikes a unique balance by developing strength, improving focus, and enhancing mental resilience while also being relaxing, meditative and fun. Reserve for Archery Falconry Experience the ancient art of falconry, a 4,000-year-old practice, right here at Grande Lakes. Learn about the species, rules, and history of this fascinating tradition. After a quick training session, join us in the field where birds of prey will swoop down from the trees at your call. What makes this experience so unique is that it's not offered anywhere else in the State of Florida. We take pride in being Florida's sole certified falconry experience approved by the U.S. National Fish & Wildlife Service. Don't let this opportunity fly away! Reserve - Falconry Reserve for Falconry Go to previous slide Go to next slide Hidden Trail Mountain Bikes Get ready for an exhilarating mountain biking experience on our extensive grounds. Our two-mile radius trail is tailored for intermediate and advanced riders, providing an unmatched blend of adventure and fun. Find Grande Lakes Sports in The Ritz-Carlton breezeway on the ground floor to rent your bike. Call (407) 393-4531 to contact Grande Lakes Sports. Kayaks & Canoes Experience the thrill of the great outdoors with your friends and family in a canoe or a single-seater kayak. As you paddle through our tranquil Grande Lake, witness the vibrant wildlife that makes Central Florida unique. Coastal Wake We offer fully customizable charters for unforgettable all-day water escapes. We pride ourselves on our luxury wake board experience. Our top-tier service will give you a day on the water you will never forget! This is an off-property activity located in Maitland, FL. Reserve your experience with Coastal Wake by dialing 407-399-7080 or email Michael@coastalwake.com. Go to previous slide Go to next slide Fishing Join our seasoned fishing guide on a private expedition to catch trophy largemouth bass within our expansive 500 acre resort. With 12 diverse lakes and ponds and the remote 48 acre Shingle Lake, you can opt to fish from a Hyde drift boat or roam the terrain in our custom Outfitter's golf cart. This catch-and-release adventure requires no license, and we provide all the necessary fishing gear. Published on 16-10-2016 View all Description Additional information Formerly owned by Yorkstone Property Ltd, who bought the pub from the Spirit group in 2008, the Fairways was acquired in Jan 2016 by Lincolnshire brewer George Bateman & Son Ltd for an undisclosed sum. As a result three Batemans cask beers have been installed on the bar, one of which is changing. This substantial roadside pub, on the main road from Sheffield to Bawtry is approximately 1.5 miles from the M1, junction 34 and 2 miles from junction 33. It overlooks Phoenix Golf Course to the rear with views across the greens. An extensive food menu is served, including breakfast. Special offers on meals on certain days. There are seven letting rooms. Events inc a Saturday night quiz and occasional weekend live music and an open mic night on Thursdays.
